title: All the Regional Plan / Development Plan Roads and all the Main / Arterial / Ring Roads, shall always be open for general public, irrespective of the fact that, they resides in the project or not
clause_text: All the Regional Plan / Development Plan Roads and all the Main / Arterial / Ring Roads, shall always be open for general public, irrespective of the fact that, they resides in the project or not.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
